item.title: Command Is Way To Long?
item.dc:creator: @LeechYourStuffPlease LeechYourStuffPlease
item.description:
@LeechYourStuffPlease wrote:

This command is pretty long just making sure to check with a decent coder if I indeed do not need the half i pasted.

	if (command.startsWith("npc"))
		{
		try {
		int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4));
		if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) {
		server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 1), heightLevel, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0);
		sendMessage("You spawn an npc");
		} else {
		sendMessage("No such NPC.");
		}
		} catch(Exception e) {
		sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1");
		}
		}
		else if (command.startsWith("npc")) {
		try
		{
		int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4));
                    if (newNPC >= 0)
		{
		server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 0), heightLevel, absX + 10, absY + 10, absX + -10, absY + -10, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(newNPC), false);
		sendMessage("You spawn an npc");
		} else {
		sendMessage("No such NPC.");
		}
		} catch(Exception e) {
		sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1");
		}

Do I need this part?

		else if (command.startsWith("npc")) {
		try
		{
		int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4));
                    if (newNPC >= 0)
		{
		server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 0), heightLevel, absX + 10, absY + 10, absX + -10, absY + -10, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(newNPC), false);
		sendMessage("You spawn an npc");
		} else {
		sendMessage("No such NPC.");
		}
		} catch(Exception e) {
		sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1");
		}

Read full topic
